issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The slow-start of the bloom filter vertex is a scheduling problem which causes more pre-emption than is useful.

When the bloom filters are arranged as follows

Map 1(10 tasks)->Reducer 2(1 task)->Map 3(100 tasks)

Map 3 and Map 1 are immediately active since Reducer 2 -> Map 3 is a broadcast edge.

Once 3 tasks in Map 1 finish, the engine kills one active task from Map 3 to make room for Reducer 2.
fields.summary: Semijoin: Disable slow-start for the bloom filter aggregate task
